From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Setting- a bright sunny evening, the sun beginning to set over the
Himilayas. the snow reflecting the red from the sky. A large bald Eagle
spreads his wings to take flight carrying a wounded bot.

Ignatius flew quietly through the mountains. He'd been through this route
many times on missions with the trainers. He opened a comm to his boss.
"You'd better have a repair table ready. Our wofs beat up pretty badly." the
tone of his voice resonated the urgency of the task at hand. If Slayer
didn't receive a transplant of mech fluid soon he'd be offline.

Prebon heard the dire news and with great concern jumped out of his command
chair. "Bullet, prepare a table for an emergency." he called through his
comm, Slayers survival was priority one right now.

"Yes sir" was the reply from Bullet as he rushed to the med room.

Prebon shouted out another series of commands to prepare for the incoming
wounded headed thier way. the troops reacted almost as if predicting the
next words out of thier leaders mouth.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, December 04, 2000 10:15 PM
Subject: Re: The trainers return


> There's no Maximal data in Slayer. His data tracks were completely
> destroyed.
>
>
> ::Slayer::
>
> Slayer's unconscious body was picked up by Iguanus. His repair
> systems started working, but he was losing alot of fuel.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Prebon worried about the disappearance of Slayer, finally the scans
> > got a lock.
> >
> > Prebon, I have a positive lock on Slayers position. he's buried in
> > the mountains not to far from where his last report was." Blaze
> > called out from his station.
> >
> > "Send Ignatius to retrieve him immediately." Prebon responded
> > irritably slamming his hand on the wall. A tiny drop of mech fluid
> > dripped from his hand. he caught it and squeezed it as if it were
> one
> > of his enemies. "We need Slayers knowledge of the Maximals if we
> are
> > to defeat them."
> >
> > A bald Eagle flew low to avoid Maximal scanners. He was close to
> the
> > ark and knew they wouldn't be happy to see him. he swooped low and
> > located the nearly frozen Slayer in stasis lock. Slayer was missing
> a
> > limb as well as most of his mech fluid. Ignatius quickly
> transformed
> > and put his arms around Slayer. he lifted the injured bots head and
> > checked it's status. The rescuer transformed and once again an
> eagle
> > floated above the ground. the great bird grabbed its prey and
> started
> > flying back to the Trainers secret hideout.
>
>
>
>
>
